Spl pulao : Lunch / Dinner Recipe Servings : 3Â  Duration - 30 minsÂ  Pulao is a dish in which rice cooked with spices, vegetables, onion depending on the cuisine.It can be prepared either with normal rice or basmati rice. I cooked pulao with Basmati rice which is long grain ğŸŒ¾Â to enhance the flavor and also added aloo - Gobi and Methi leaves. Aloo Gobi is a great combination in Indian Recipes , you might also prepare curry, fry, Manchurian,pulao and Biryani. Aloo - potato Gobi - Cauliflower Methi - Fenugreek leaves ğŸƒ Today, I cooked a spl pulao which is mild spicy, flavor of Methi and good to taste with raita Let's start with Ingredients and follows procedure Ingredients: Basmati Rice - 1 cup Aloo / potato - diced - 1 cup Gobi/ Cauliflower - Chopped - 1 cup Methi leaves - fresh - 1 cup Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1 teaspoon Cloves - 2 to 3 Cinnamon - 2 small pieces Cardamom - 1 Bayleaf - 1 Ginger-Garlic paste - 1/2 tb sp Green chillies - 6, Mint leaves - 1/4 cup - paste Mint leaves - 1/2 cup Red chilly powder - 1/2 tb sp Turmeric powder - 1/2 teaspoon Oil - 2 tb sp Salt - to taste Procedure:
  • Wash Basmati rice twice , add water and keep aside
  • Soak 15 mins
1 cup rice - 1 and half cup water to this PulaoÂ 
  • Make green chillies+ mint leaves paste and keep aside
  • Heat frying pan on medium to high heat
  • Add oil , Jeera/cumin seeds let them fry add cloves, cinnamon, cardamom and biryani leaf in it
  • Saute for one minute
  • Add green chillies + mint leaves and ginger-garlic paste
  • Saute them andÂ Add chopped cauliflower
  • Close with lid and cook one minute
  • Add diced potato
  • Saute for 1 min and cook 2 mins
  • Next add red chilly powder, turmeric powder , mint leaves and salt
  • Mix them well and saute for one Min
  • Add 3 tb sp of water , sauteÂ them and Close with lid
  • Cook 2 mins
  • Next add chopped fenugreek leaves
  • Add soaked rice and mix gently
  • Add water and saute
  • Cook for 15 mins on low-medium heat and close with lid
  • After 15 mins check rice and it's cooked well
  • Switch off cook top/ Burner and Keep it in steam for more 5 mins
  • Serve it with raita/ raw onion
  • It's delicious ğŸ˜‹Â enjoy your day
